info.title: BananaPong
info.description: This is the documentation of the BananaPong server. Remember that the JWT is necessary for all the operations (except the ones that are public), Make sure you input a correct JWT token in the Authorize menu.

tags.name: channel me
tags.description: Everything about the channels for the current user

tags.name: channel id
tags.description: Everything about the channels for any user

tags.name: user me
tags.description: Everything about the users for the current user

tags.name: user id
tags.description: Everything about the users for any user

UnauthorizedError.description: JWT Token is invalid or empty

UnauthorizedValue.description: You tried to modify a value you don't have access to

NotExist.description: User and / or Channel does not exist

ValueNotSpecified.description: One value that was requiered was not specified

DatabaseError.description: There was an error in the database

AlreadyExist.description: Entity already exists in the object

post.summary: The current user creates a 2fa authentification

delete.summary: The current user deletes his 2fa authentification

post.summary: The current user generates a new JWT for 2fa

get.summary: Checks if the JWT is valid or not, returns a boolean
Authentificate with 42 oauth then generates a JWT returned in the URL
Get the 2fa QR code for the current user

put.summary: The current user verifies his 2fa authentification

get.summary: Generates a JWT token for the user (specified by id), if that user doesn't exist it will get created
Returns the Gameroom the user is in (specified by id)

post.summary: The current user creates a channel object

get.summary: Returns all the channels objects the current user is in

put.summary: Makes the current user join the channel (specified in body)

requestBody.description: Channel object (only id necessary, password aswell if room isnt public)

put.summary: Modifies the channel object (specified by id)
Modifies the channel object (specified by id) (more specifically the adminId)

requestBody.description: Id of the user whom you wish to make admin of the channel

put.summary: Modifies the banneduser object of the channel object (specified by id)

post.summary: Modifies the channel object (specified by id) (more specifically the password)

put.summary: Modifies the muteduser object of the channel object (specified by id)
Makes the current user leave the channel (specified by id)

get.summary: Returns the log object of the channel object (specified by id)

put.summary: Modifies the log object of the channel object (specified by id)
Makes the current user kick the user (specified by userid) from the channel (specified by id)

get.summary: Returns all the channels objects of the server (some information is excluded)
Returns the channel object (specified by id)

post.summary: Creates a channel object for the user (specified by id)

delete.summary: Delete the channel object (specified by id)

put.summary: Modifies the user object of the channel object

requestBody.description: Id of the room where you want to add the user into (and password if room is private)

put.summary: Checks the channel object with the password given in the body

requestBody.description: password you which to check with the channel object password

put.summary: Modifies the log object of the channel object (specified by id) (for the user specified by userid)
Modifies the current user's object (more specifically the blocked array)

requestBody.description: Id of the user you wish to block

put.summary: Modifies the current user's object (more specifically the followed array)

requestBody.description: Id of the user you wish to follow

get.summary: Returns all the users of the server
Returns the user object (specified by id)

put.summary: Modifies the user object (specified by id)

delete.summary: Delete the user object (specified by id)

get.summary: Returns the user's avatar (specified by id)

put.summary: Returns the user's avatar (specified by id)

get.summary: Returns the user's matches (specified by id)
Returns the user's rank (specified by id)
